definitions: a person or thing that emits or uses blasts

examples.text: blasters were paid according to how much rock they broke

shortDefinitions: person or thing that blows or emits blasts

definitions: (in science fiction) a weapon like a gun that is able to destroy something solid, typically using light or sound energy

examples.text: don't try to stand in the way of laser blasters
where was a super sonic death ray blaster gun when you needed one?

shortDefinitions: gunlike weapon that can destroy something solid

definitions: a move in which a ball is kicked or struck forcefully

examples.text: he let fly with a 35-yard blaster

shortDefinitions: move in which ball is kicked or struck forcefully

definitions: a type of physical exercise intended to strengthen specific muscle groups

examples.text: squats represent a total blaster for quads

shortDefinitions: type of physical exercise intended to strengthen specific muscle groups
